sentence.text: Broad adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway methylation abnormalities are also observed in most sporadic PHP1B (sporPHP1B) cases.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: We now investigated 23 Japanese sporPHP1B cases, who presented with hypocalcemia, hyperphosphatemia, elevated negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II levels, and occasionally with TSH elevations and mild AHO features.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
